title: Remiscoin5
author: Remiscoin5
content: In all these years that our president has been in power ,this changing of money never occurred to him??? Why now that he is about living sit ?? Is this the main time our president or higher authorities will be changing money ,?? Now that we are about doing election?? My fellow Nigerians we need to talk about this and why and the main purpose it's happening now

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I reported this thread before It was moved from bitcoin discussion to local board, stop spamming the main boards.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: According to wetin CBN governor they talk, the naira redesign na something wey supoose to they happen periodically (i no get the fact on how often is suppose they happen), but Naija never do am for awhile now, him also talk say the naira redisign plus the implementation of this cashless policy go help the economy/tackle inflation, him also talk say the thing go help to curb electoral irregularities, plus other reasons wey him give so.Having said that, whilst i no agree with the CBN governor on most of the reasons wey him give, wetin everybody fit agree be say the implementation of all these they very poor and wasn't planned well, you no fit talk say the policy was meant to better our lives, whilst during its implementation like this so, people just they suffer, small businesses just they close and Nigerians just they frustrated. As for the timing, me i no really understand why it had to be now, so many people they talk say Buhari no they in support of Tinubu wey be him party presidential candidate, so him they do this things so people no go vote APC; me i no know all those ones, wetin me i know be say make Nigerian government no they suffer their citizens like this, e no make sense at all.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: I'd suggest that the goal of the extra funding, especially during this election season, is to end election rigging. The Nigerian President has made one of his wisest moves in decades. knowing well well that the majority of politicians buy votes with their money. All the politicians who planned to buy votes are now trapped because there is no new money in circulation and their old money is no longer useful due to the introduction of new money. The upcoming election will be free and fair as a result.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Alphakilo on February 20, 2023, 11:39:06 PMThe upcoming election will be free and fair as a result.In as much as i want and pray say make this election they free and fair, we suppose understand say electoral malpractice/irregularities they in different forms/ways, no be only through vote buying wey electoral malpractice they happen. And me i believe say these politicians go still find way to buy vote, e fit no happen like before based on say cash they scarce, but to a little extent them go still find way to buy votes. But wetin be my concern be say, is all these sufferings worth it, cash no they, people they starve, businesses they close, etc, and you come they tell us say all of these go stop vote buying, it is all somewhat counterproductive and to a large extent unreasonable.
